programme.desc: Shamsu rapes his best friends wife on the night of their wedding out of jealousy and obsession, now he is back again to claim the child, best friends have now become foe.

programme.title: Namijin Barkono
programme.desc: Kamal is offered a job by his friend and a section of his apartment to stay with his. After some time, Kamal suspects his wife of cheating.

programme.title: Bilkeesu
programme.desc: A group of friends find themselves in a troubling situation when each member of the group begins to die mysteriously.

programme.title: Rayuwar Mu
programme.desc: A program that showcases a wide variety of delicious and affordable cuisine and the process of how it is made.

programme.title: Nsogbu Bitcoin
programme.desc: A community plug their resources, sells asset, and raise money to deal in bitcoin only to be defrauded by the man who introduced them to it.

programme.title: Di Wayo M
programme.desc: A primitive girl who is newly married to her foreign based husband, entertains another woman in her matrimonial bed just to please her husband.

programme.title: Oge Nkwa
programme.desc: A musical play list that highlights the rich cultural aesthetics of the Igbo people. It is also filled with entertainment and information through music.

programme.title: Omalicha Mma
programme.desc: In a quest to get married, a young girl engages in relationships, but the over pampered nature which she was raised, makes it impossible for any man to marry her.

programme.title: Chikito: Troublesome Girl
programme.desc: A stubborn girl who engages in lots of crime and stealing takes a new leaf after the curse that pushes her into crime is lifted.

programme.title: Obi Bobo
programme.desc: As fame and fortune envelop Obiora, he forgets his wifes sacrifices. Drawn by fans and glamour, he neglects her and has affairs.

programme.title: Adaora Bu Nkem
programme.desc: Her fathers insistence on marriage drives her to desperation, so she hires a stranger to pose as her fiance. The plan backfires, leading to blackmail and financial ruin.

programme.title: Ebighi Ebi
programme.desc: Ogechi is under pressure from her family to bring a suitor home. When she finds the love of her life, oppositions and obstacles stand in their way of happiness.

programme.title: Uloamaka
programme.desc: In an act of greed and wickedness, a man demands his brothers properties from his widow who is still mourning her husband and will do anything to have them.

programme.title: Ugbo Njem
programme.desc: Showcases the journey across Igbo land where knowledge is explored about what the people consider a taboo or a scared culture unique to them.

programme.title: Nwunye Bekee
programme.desc: Nwunye Bekee is a TV Reality Show which explores marriages/relationships between Igbo/Nigerian men and their white women.

programme.title: Onye Ga Anum
programme.desc: A young mans loyalty and love is tested when declared his interest to marry a woman from a wealthy home.

programme.title: Mma Bu Olu
programme.desc: A mans jealousy drives him to push a young girl into madness. Despite this, she finds a suitor. Redemption ensues as she regains consciousness and exposes the mans wickedness.

programme.title: Ojadili
programme.desc: Kiddies storytelling programme embedded with dance, that promotes and educate the youngsters on the moral values of the Igbo culture and way of life.

programme.title: Nsukka Deeje

programme.title: Nkeiruka
programme.desc: A young girl who is determined to become successful in life is faced with a lot of life challenges.

programme.title: Mkpuru Mma
programme.desc: Sisters conspire against their very own because of envy, in other to plot her downfall.

programme.title: Ego Yahoo
programme.desc: Desperation to make money at all costs, leads a young man into fraud and charm, which eventually leads to his doom.

programme.title: Nwa Mamiwota

programme.desc: Desperation to live big and have many girls makes a few young men resort to fake live.

programme.desc: A man who seeks out a new young wife finds himself bewitched by her, leading him to neglect and abandon his children.

programme.desc: An interactive, educational, and informative program targeting all ages. It encourages all Igbos to embrace Igbo tradition and culture in our day-to-day activities.

programme.title: Onye Eze
programme.desc: In a gripping thriller, a mans sudden kidnap sparks a high-stakes investigation. As detectives dig deeper, they uncover shocking revelations that turn the case on its head.

programme.title: Ndiowu

programme.title: Onochie
programme.desc: A greedy brother kills his sibling and attempts to covet his property out of envy. Nemesis catches up with him as the consequences of his evil deeds come to haunt him.

programme.title: Onowuama Udene
programme.desc: A man bewitches the king and his family just to continue to manipulate the kingdom and the throne.

programme.title: Nkwekorita
programme.desc: In a bid to find out the cause of the strange death in her family, she goes into the evil forest for spiritual revelation and truth.

programme.title: Onye Esimesi Anyi
programme.desc: To swindle sisters, a man bewitches them and continues to have an illicit affair with them.

programme.title: Oge Nkwa
programme.desc: A musical play list that highlights the rich cultural aesthetics of the Igbo people. It is also filled with entertainment and information through music.

programme.title: Last Intention
programme.desc: The peace in a happy home is disrupted due to betrayal, throwing a loyal wife into dilemma, betrayal and conflict. Watch how the drama unravels.

programme.title: Ibinu Omo
programme.desc: A rivalry leads to the birth of a young opposition who soon finds himself in the distant future where his powers become useful in his bid to exact revenge.

programme.title: Arrangement
programme.desc: In order to access her fathers inheritance, Modupetemi must accept marrying to a man prearranged by her mother.

programme.title: Ogba Mecho
programme.desc: This is a series that relates with almost all individuals and the day to day activities at a mechanics workshop.

programme.title: The Tenant
programme.desc: This is a story of how tenants co habit in a house and its neighbourhood as well as the role of the landlord.

programme.title: Fere
programme.desc: A thug jilts his pregnant lover over her local lifestyle. She makes way to her aunts where she meets fortune by the village heads decree.

programme.title: Stay Forever
programme.desc: Three things you should never break: Promise, trust and human heart! Demilade broke the three when he discovered his soul mate was a sickle cell carrier.

programme.title: Temi Bawa
programme.desc: A mother extends her aggression over her past failure to her daughter. Her pain later becomes a lesson for a man who is on the verge of suicide.

programme.title: Ana Oba
programme.desc: This is a story of a modern king forced into a hopeless romance with a maiden. His quest to seek his own royal bride comes to fulfillment but at what cost?

programme.title: Itakun
programme.desc: The unending rift between two sisters ends up putting there mother to unending problems. See how this plays out.

programme.title: Haunted Pleasure
programme.desc: A cheating husband has his way with single ladies and breaks their heart at the end. After a humiliating incident, he resorts to revenge through what he does best.

programme.title: Step Brother
programme.desc: A young couple abroad welcome the husbands stepbrother and his wife from Nigeria and find themselves drawn into taboos that will tempt their faith as a family.

programme.title: Masoyinbo
programme.desc: This is a test of your knowledge of the Yoruba language. The rules are simple- no other language apart from Yoruba, while the winner leaves with an attractive sum.

programme.title: Egbe Orun
programme.desc: A young lady encounters strange challenges of life that leads her to conclude she may be cursed. Follow how she finds solution in a fellow student.

programme.title: Kolade
programme.desc: A dubious money lender adds fetish practices into her business in her bid to entrap her customers. This is about to change when three broke friends seek her help.

programme.title: Ogogo
programme.desc: A young couple is plunged into a series of quests for answers when the husband is struck with recurrent excruciating pain.

programme.title: Akoja Ofin
programme.desc: Driven by greed, a young lady falls for a young gentleman. A promising love affair ensues but soon secrets are revealed when his wife shows up with a heated fight

programme.title: Se Bio Timo
programme.desc: This is a movie that shows how going out of your way to please others may cost you a lot, if not your life.

programme.title: Last Visit
programme.desc: This is a story of a young man who lives a reckless life. Unfortunately for him, he found himself falling in love with a young lady who he gets stuck with.

programme.title: The Tenant
programme.desc: This is a story of how tenants co habit in a house and its neighbourhood as well as the role of the landlord.

programme.title: Ewon Ife
programme.desc: A workaholic encounters love at first sight, as she marries her new heartthrob. This new life takes a surprising turn from their wedding night as his true colour manifests.

programme.title: Okunrin TI Daran
programme.desc: A young lady gets sought after by different suitors under her control. It takes a different turn when she doesnt show interest in any of them.

programme.title: Ekun Mefa
programme.desc: A young man strives to care for his impoverished family. A reunion brings back the past when he is offered a mission to eliminate some powerful targets.

programme.title: Love And Lust
programme.desc: Four bosom friends, two siblings driven by love get married on the same day. The beauty of their friendship and marriage is soon halted by each ones marriage personal challenge.

programme.title: Iriri Mi
programme.desc: A young woman consumed by a deep hatred for men retreats to a world of isolation and anger, till she meets a charming young man who forces her to confront her past.

programme.title: Finding Ireti
programme.desc: Left under the care of domestic workers, an over pampered child blackmails her maid into taking her to the market. See what happens next.

programme.title: Masoyinbo
programme.desc: This is a test of your knowledge of the Yoruba language. The rules are simple- no other language apart from Yoruba, while the winner leaves with an attractive sum.

programme.title: Morufu Artesunate
programme.desc: A society filled with diverse personalities homes a glutton whose love for eating begets problem in his community. What happens when he finds bad luck in a food competition?

programme.title: Papa Show
programme.desc: A young man has an unusual preference for petite women, a preference that collides against the decisions of his loved ones, spelling chaos and drama.

programme.title: Akeregbe
programme.desc: A battle line is drawn in a home where a younger wife tries to win his first sons acceptance. Her efforts prove worthy when the family is plunged into sudden tragedy.

programme.title: Mistake
programme.desc: An abused married woman finds refuge in her family doctor. This leads to an illicit affair that becomes hard to pull out. Watch how this unravels.

programme.title: Sewa Savage
programme.desc: A man reports for an interview only to meet his wife as the owner of the company. He returns, after being harshly sent away to meet her at home.
